title: Stage Lv7-P1-S06
description: Level 7 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: While I was studying the report that had been prepared last week, I realized we will need to revise our strategy.
The technology that we have been developing will revolutionize the industry by the time our competitors catch up.
learning_points: Level 7 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 지난주에 준비된 보고서를 검토하고 있던 중에, 우리가 전략을 수정해야 할 것이라는 것을 깨달았다.
sentences.en: While I was studying the report that had been prepared last week, I realized we will need to revise our strategy.

sentences.kr: 우리가 개발해오고 있는 기술은 경쟁자들이 따라잡을 때쯤이면 산업에 혁명을 일으킬 것이다.
sentences.en: The technology that we have been developing will revolutionize the industry by the time our competitors catch up.

sentences.kr: 그녀는 제안서를 작업해오고 있었으며 내일까지 준비해 놓겠다고 나에게 말했다.
sentences.en: She told me that she had been working on the proposal and would have it ready by tomorrow.

sentences.kr: 그가 발표하고 있는 동안, 나는 그가 지난 달에 언급했던 데이터가 정확할 것이라고 확신했다.
sentences.en: While he was presenting, I was confident that the data he had mentioned last month would be accurate.

sentences.kr: 우리가 논의해온 계획은 다음 분기에 실행될 것이고, 그때까지 모든 팀원들이 훈련을 받았을 것이다.
sentences.en: The plan we have been discussing will be implemented next quarter, and by then all team members will have received training.

sentences.kr: 문제가 해결되고 있는 동안, 우리는 이전에 시도했던 방법들이 효과적이지 않았다는 것을 인정해야 했다.
sentences.en: While the problem was being resolved, we had to admit that the methods we had tried before hadn't been effective.

sentences.kr: 시장이 변화하고 있는 것을 알고 있었기 때문에, 우리는 작년에 시작한 연구가 곧 결실을 맺을 것이라고 기대했다.
sentences.en: Knowing that the market was changing, we expected that the research we had started last year would soon bear fruit.

sentences.kr: 새로운 정책이 발표되었을 때, 직원들은 몇 주 동안 궁금해해왔던 것이 마침내 명확해질 것이라고 느꼈다.
sentences.en: When the new policy was announced, employees felt that what they had been wondering about for weeks would finally become clear.
